pli-tv-kd15:1.1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā nahāyamānā rukkhe kāyaṃ ugghaṃsessanti, ūrumpi bāhumpi urampi piṭṭhimpi, seyyathāpi mallamuṭṭhikā gāmamoddavā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:1.1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:1.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.

pli-tv-kd15:1.1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nahāyamānā rukkhe kāyaṃ ugghaṃsenti, ūrumpi bāhumpi urampi piṭṭhimpī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:1.1.11: “ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ moghapurisānaṃ ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:1.1.12: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā nahāyamānā rukkhe kāyaṃ ugghaṃsessanti, ūrumpi bāhumpi urampi piṭṭhimpi?

pli-tv-kd15:2.4.14: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhappaccayā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:2.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mukhaṃ ālimpanti …pe…

pli-tv-kd15:2.6.6: “Na, bhikkhave, naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gantabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyanti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa mahagghassa candanassa candanagaṇṭhi uppannā hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.4: Lekhañca me paribhogaṃ bhavissati, pattañca dānaṃ dassāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.5: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhi tāya candanagaṇṭhiyā pattaṃ lekhāpetvā sikkāya uḍḍitvā veḷagge ālaggetvā veḷuparamparāya bandhitvā evamāha—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.6: “yo samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā arahā ceva iddhimā ca dinnaṃyeva pattaṃ oharatū”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.7: Atha kho pūraṇo kassapo yena rājagahako seṭṭhi tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā rājagahakaṃ seṭṭhiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.8: “ahañhi, gahapati, arahā ceva iddhimā ca, dehi me pattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.9: “Sace, bhante, āyasmā arahā ceva iddhimā ca dinnaṃyeva pattaṃ oharatū”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.15: “ahañhi, gahapati, arahā ceva iddhimā ca, dehi me pattan”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.17: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca piṇḍolabhāradvājo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.18: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.19: “āyasmā kho mahāmoggallāno arahā ceva iddhimā ca.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.22: “Āyasmā kho bhāradvājo arahā ceva iddhimā ca.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.25: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā taṃ pattaṃ gahetvā tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.26: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahako seṭṭhi saputtadāro sake nivesane ṭhito hoti pañjaliko namassamāno—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.27: idheva, bhante, ayyo bhāradvājo amhākaṃ nivesane patiṭṭhātūti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.28: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa nivesane patiṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.29: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhi āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā mahagghassa khādanīyassa pūretvā āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.30: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo taṃ pattaṃ gahetvā ārāmaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.2: ayyena kira piṇḍolabhāradvājena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa patto ohāritoti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.3: Te ca manussā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.6: “kiṃ nu kho so, ānanda, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.7: “Āyasmatā, bhante, piṇḍolabhāradvājena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa patto ohārito.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.9: ayyena kira piṇḍolabhāradvājena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa patto ohāritoti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.10: Te ca, bhante, manussā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.11: So eso, bhante, bhagavā uccāsaddo mahāsaddo”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.2.17: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, bhāradvāja, chavassa dārupattassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ uttari manussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassessasi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.18: Seyyathāpi, bhāradvāja, mātugāmo chavassa māsakarūpassa kāraṇā kopinaṃ dasseti;

pli-tv-kd15:9.2.18: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhārenti rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatāni.
pli-tv-kd15:9.2.23: “Na, bhikkhave, citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatāni.
pli-tv-kd15:9.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sodakaṃ pattaṃ paṭisāmenti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.3.7: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sodakaṃ pattaṃ otāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.3.12: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vodakaṃ katvā otāpetvā pattaṃ paṭisāmetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.3.13: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uṇhe pattaṃ nidahanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.3.18: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, muhuttaṃ uṇhe otāpetvā pattaṃ paṭisāmetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā pattā ajjhokāse anādhārā nikkhittā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.4.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū miḍḍhante pattaṃ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.4.10: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paribhaṇḍante pattaṃ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.4.15: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chamāya pattaṃ nikkujjanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhittikhilepi nāgadantakepi pattaṃ laggenti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.6: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū mañce pattaṃ nikkhipanti, satisammosā nisīdantā ottharitvā pattaṃ bhindenti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.10: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū pīṭhe pattaṃ nikkhipanti, satisammosā nisīdantā ottharitvā pattaṃ bhindenti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.14: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aṅke pattaṃ nikkhipanti, satisammosā uṭṭhahanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.19: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chatte pattaṃ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.20: Vātamaṇḍalikāya chattaṃ ukkhipiyati paripatitvā patto bhijjati.
pli-tv-kd15:9.5.24: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū pattahatthā kavāṭaṃ paṇāmenti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tumbakaṭāhe piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.1.7: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ghaṭikaṭāhe piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sabbapaṃsukūliko hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.2.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chavasīsassa pattaṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi pisācillikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū calakānipi aṭṭhikānipi ucchiṭṭhodakampi pattena nīharanti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.3.3: “yasmiṃ yevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bhuñjanti sova nesaṃ paṭiggaho”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:10.3.5: “Na bhikkhave, calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā pattena nīharitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:11.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū hatthena vipphāḷetvā cīvaraṃ sibbenti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa daṇḍasatthakaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.1.8: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace satthakadaṇḍe dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:11.1.14: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ dantamayaṃ visāṇamayaṃ naḷamayaṃ veḷumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ jatumayaṃ phalamayaṃ lohamayaṃ saṅkhanābhimayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kukkuṭapattenapi veḷupesikāyapi cīvaraṃ sibbenti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tattha tattha khilaṃ nikkhaṇitvā sambandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbenti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.3.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kathinaṃ kathinarajjuṃ tattha tattha obandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.3.15: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, daṇḍakathinaṃ bidalakaṃ salākaṃ vinandhanarajjuṃ vinandhanasuttaṃ vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.6: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū allehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.11: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saupāhanā kathinaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbantā aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.5: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace paṭiggahe dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.13: Tena kho pana samayena sūciyopi satthakāpi paṭiggahāpi nassanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū abbhokāse cīvaraṃ sibbantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.6.17: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjukan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbetvā tattheva kathinaṃ ujjhitvā pakkamanti, undūrehipi upacikāhipi khajjati.
pli-tv-kd15:11.7.8: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kuṭṭepi thambhepi kathinaṃ ussāpetvā pakkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.7.11: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhittikhile vā nāgadante vā laggetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sūcikampi satthakampi bhesajjampi pattena ādāya gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu upāhanāyo kāyabandhanena bandhitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.8: Aññataro upāsako taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādento upāhanāyo sīsena ghaṭṭeti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.10: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena antarāmagge udakaṃ akappiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.7: Atha kho so bhikkhu pipāsāya pīḷito upanaddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.11: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.12: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, parissāvanaṃ yāciyamāno na adāsī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu parissāvanaṃ yāciyamāno na dassatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.17: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.18: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, parissāvanaṃ yāciyamāno na adāsī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.21: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.22: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, parissāvanaṃ yāciyamāno na dassasi.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.26: “na, bhikkhave, addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā parissāvanaṃ yāciyamānena na dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.28: Na ca, bhikkhave, aparissāvanakena addhāno paṭipajjitabbo.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.30: Sace na hoti parissāvanaṃ vā dhammakaraṇo vā, saṅghāṭikaṇṇopi adhiṭṭhātabbo—
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.10: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū makasehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ paṇītānaṃ bhattānaṃ bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.2: Bhikkhū paṇītāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā abhisannakāyā honti bahvābādhā.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.3: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco vesāliṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.4: Addasā kho jīvako komārabhacco bhikkhū abhisannakāye bahvābādhe.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.5: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.8: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ caṅkamañca jantāgharañca anujānātu.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.10: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.11: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.12: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū visame caṅkame caṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.16: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū caṅkame caṅkamantā paripatanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.19: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse caṅkamantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.24: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.12: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanachiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.17: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū khuddake jantāghare majjhe aggiṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.20: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, khuddake jantāghare ekamantaṃ aggiṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ, mahallake majjhe”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.40: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāghare chamāya nisīdanti, gattāni kaṇḍūvanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.43: Tena kho pana samayena jantāgharaṃ aparikkhittaṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:14.4.14: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanachiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.4.17: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:15.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū naggā naggaṃ abhivādenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:15.1.2: naggā naggaṃ abhivādāpenti, naggā naggassa parikammaṃ karonti, naggā naggassa parikammaṃ kārāpenti, naggā naggassa denti, naggā paṭiggaṇhanti, naggā khādanti, naggā bhuñjanti, naggā sāyanti, naggā pivanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāghare chamāya cīvaraṃ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāgharepi udakepi parikammaṃ kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena jantāghare udakaṃ na hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.17: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū vallikāyapi kāyabandhanenapi udakaṃ vāhenti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.25: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse udakaṃ vāhentā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.30: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.31: Udapāno apāruto hoti, tiṇacuṇṇehipi paṃsukehipi okiriyyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:17.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṃ tahaṃ nahāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.1.14: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ gattāni sītigatāni honti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako saṃghassa atthāya pokkharaṇiṃ kāretukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.2.14: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu saṃghassa atthāya nillekhaṃ jantāgharaṃ kattukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cātumāsaṃ nisīdanena vippavasanti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.6: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.11: Tena kho pana samayena manussā gandhampi mālampi ādāya ārāmaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.14: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gandhaṃ gahetvā kavāṭe pañcaṅgulikaṃ dātuṃ, pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa namatakaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.7: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū āsittakūpadhāne bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.13: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.14: So bhuñjamāno na sakkoti hatthena pattaṃ sandhāretuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:19.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:19.2.2: ekathālakepi pivanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahāyo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.2: Atha kho vaḍḍho licchavī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.5: Dutiyampi kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.8: Tatiyampi kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.11: “Kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, kissa maṃ ayyā nālapantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.12: “Tathā hi pana tvaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.14: “Sace kho tvaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, iccheyyāsi, ajjeva bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.15: “Kyāhaṃ, ayyā, karomi, kiṃ mayā sakkā kātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.16: “Ehi tvaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ evaṃ vadehi—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.18: Yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.21: ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajāpati dūsitā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.1: “Evaṃ, ayyā”ti kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vaḍḍho licchavī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.4: Yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.7: ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajāpati dūsitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.9: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ vaḍḍho āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.12: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.13: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ vaḍḍho āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.18: “Yato ahaṃ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṃ nikkujjatu, asambhogaṃ saṃghena karotu.
pli-tv-kd15:20.3.3: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa patto nikkujjitabbo—

pli-tv-kd15:20.5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā vaḍḍhaṃ licchaviṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.5: saṃghena kira me patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi kira saṃghenāti—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.7: Atha kho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā vaḍḍhaṃ licchaviṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.8: “alaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, mā soci, mā paridevi.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.10: Atha kho vaḍḍho licchavī saputtadāro samittāmacco sañātisālohito allavattho allakeso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.11: “accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yohaṃ ayyaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsesiṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.12: Tassa me, bhante, bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.13: “Taggha tvaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, accayo accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.14: Yato ca kho tvaṃ, āvuso vaḍḍha, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosi, taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.15: Vuḍḍhihesā, āvuso vaḍḍha, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:20.6.3: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa patto ukkujjitabbo—
pli-tv-kd15:20.6.4: na bhikkhūnaṃ alābhāya parisakkati, na bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, na bhikkhūnaṃ avāsāya parisakkati, na bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati, na bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedeti, na buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, na dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, na saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd15:20.6.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṃ ukkujjituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.2: Tena, bhikkhave, vaḍḍhena licchavinā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.3: ‘saṃghena me, bhante, patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi saṃghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.4: Sohaṃ, bhante, sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, saṃghaṃ pattukkujjanaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.9: Saṃghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo saṃghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.10: So sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, saṃghaṃ pattukkujjanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.11: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṃ ukkujjeyya, sambhogaṃ saṃghena kareyya.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.14: Saṃghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo saṃghena.

pli-tv-kd15:21.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bhaggā tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaggā tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bodhissa rājakumārassa kokanado nāma pāsādo acirakārito hoti, anajjhāvuttho samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenaci vā manussabhūtena.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.5: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro sañcikāputtaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.6: “ehi tvaṃ, samma sañcikāputta, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda;
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.7: appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.8: ‘bodhi, bhante, rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.10: ‘adhivāsetu kira, bhante, bhagavā bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.11: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bodhissa rājakumārassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.13: “bodhi kho rājakumāro bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchati.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.15: ‘adhivāsetu kira bhavaṃ gotamo bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.1: Atha kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bodhi rājakumāro tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bodhiṃ rājakumāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.2: “avocumha kho mayaṃ bhoto vacanena taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.3: ‘bodhi kho rājakumāro bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchati.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.5: adhivāsetu kira bhavaṃ gotamo bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā’ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.7: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā, kokanadañca pāsādaṃ odātehi dussehi santharāpetvā yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā, sañcikāputtaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.8: “ehi tvaṃ, samma sañcikāputta, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocehi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.10: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bodhissa rājakumārassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.12: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bodhissa rājakumārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.13: Tena kho pana samayena bodhi rājakumāro bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhito hoti, bhagavantaṃ āgamayamāno.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.14: Addasā kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.15: Disvāna tato paccuggantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā purekkhatvā yena kokanado pāsādo tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.16: Atha kho bhagavā pacchimasopānakaḷevaraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.17: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.18: “akkamatu, bhante, bhagavā dussāni, akkamatu sugato dussāni, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.21: tatiyampi kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.22: “akkamatu, bhante, bhagavā dussāni, akkamatu sugato dussāni, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.23: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ apalokesi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.24: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bodhiṃ rājakumāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.26: Na bhagavā celapaṭikaṃ akkamissati pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.1: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro dussāni saṃharāpetvā uparikokanade pāsāde āsanaṃ paññapesi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.2: Atha kho bhagavā kokanadaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.3: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ, ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho bodhiṃ rājakumāraṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.5: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī apagatagabbhā bhikkhū nimantetvā dussaṃ paññapetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.6: Atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.7: “kathañhi nāma ayyā maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānā celapaṭikaṃ na akkamissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassā itthiyā ujjhāyantiyā khiyyantiyā vipācentiyā.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.11: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena celapaṭikaṃ akkamitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.12: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhotapādakaṃ akkamituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā bhaggesu yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.4: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā ghaṭakañca katakañca sammajjaniñca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

pli-tv-kd15:22.1.6: “paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante, bhagavā ghaṭakañca katakañca sammajjaniñca, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.9: Atha kho bhagavā visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.10: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.

pli-tv-kd15:22.2.1: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

pli-tv-kd15:23.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa makasabījanī uppannā hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa chattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattappaggahitā āhiṇḍanti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako sambahulehi ājīvakasāvakehi saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.6: Addasāsuṃ kho te ājīvakasāvakā chabbaggiye bhikkhū dūratova chattappaggahite āgacchante.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.8: “ete kho ayyā tumhākaṃ bhadantā chattappaggahitā āgacchanti, seyyathāpi gaṇakamahāmattā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.11: Atha kho so upāsako upagate sañjānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.13: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.14: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:23.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.3.2: Tassa bhikkhuno vinā chattaṃ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.4.2: gilānasseva bhagavatā chattaṃ anuññātaṃ no agilānassāti—
pli-tv-kd15:23.4.5: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre chattaṃ dhāretun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sikkāya pattaṃ uṭṭitvā daṇḍe ālaggetvā vikāle aññatarena gāmadvārena atikkamati.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.3: “esayyo coro gacchati, asissa vijjotalatī”ti anupatitvā gahetvā sañjānitvā muñciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti, na sakkoti vinā daṇḍena āhiṇḍituṃ.

pli-tv-kd15:24.2.13: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno, na sakkoti vinā daṇḍena āhiṇḍituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.15: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno daṇḍasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.18: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno, na sakkoti vinā daṇḍena āhiṇḍituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.21: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno daṇḍasammutiyā dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti, na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṃ pariharituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.5: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.7: na sakkomi vinā sikkāya pattaṃ pariharituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.13: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno, na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṃ pariharituṃ.

pli-tv-kd15:24.3.29: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—

pli-tv-kd15:25.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu romanthako hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:25.1.8: Na ca, bhikkhave, bahimukhadvāraṃ nīharitvā ajjhoharitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa saṃghabhattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā odane diyyamāne na sakkaccaṃ paṭiggahessanti, ekamekaṃ sitthaṃ kammasatena niṭṭhāyatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ diyyamānaṃ patati, taṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dīghehi nakhehi piṇḍāya carati.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.2: Aññatarā itthī passitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.5: “Sace kho tvaṃ, bhante, nappaṭisevissasi, idānāhaṃ attano nakhehi gattāni vilikhitvā kuppaṃ karissāmi—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.8: Atha kho sā itthī attano nakhehi gattāni vilikhitvā kuppaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.11: Addasāsuṃ kho te manussā tassā itthiyā nakhe chavimpi lohitampi.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.15: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.16: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, dīghe nakhe dhāresī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.20: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nakhenapi nakhaṃ chindanti, mukhenapi nakhaṃ chindanti, kuṭṭepi ghaṃsanti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.2.8: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ kārāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ kesā dīghā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.3: “Ussahanti pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ kese oropetun”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.5: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.7: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, khuraṃ khurasilaṃ khurasipāṭikaṃ namatakaṃ sabbaṃ khurabhaṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū massuṃ kappāpenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:27.4.21: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno sambādhe vaṇo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kattarikāya kese chedāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno sīse vaṇo hoti, na sakkoti khurena kese oropetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.10: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dīghāni nāsikālomāni dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.16: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sakkharikāyapi madhusitthakenapi nāsikālomaṃ gāhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.20: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū palitaṃ gāhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kaṇṇagūthakehi kaṇṇā thakitā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā kaṇṇamalaharaṇiyo dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.10: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ dantamayaṃ visāṇamayaṃ naḷamayaṃ veḷumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ jatumayaṃ phalamayaṃ lohamayaṃ saṅkhanābhimayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ kaṃsabhaṇḍaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.2: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bahuṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ kaṃsabhaṇḍaṃ sannicayaṃ karissanti, seyyathāpi kaṃsapattharikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.5: “Na, bhikkhave, bahuṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ kaṃsabhaṇḍaṃ sannicayo kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū añjanimpi añjanisalākampi kaṇṇamalaharaṇimpi bandhanamattampi kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdanti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.9: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.10: Tassa vinā āyogena na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.16: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tantakaṃ vemaṃ kavaṭaṃ salākaṃ sabbaṃ tantabhaṇḍakan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu akāyabandhano gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.1.5: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacāni kāyabandhanāni dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd15:29.2.17: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace vidhe dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando lahukā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.6: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā gaṇṭhikāyo dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.12: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ dantamayaṃ visāṇamayaṃ naḷamayaṃ veḷumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ jatumayaṃ phalamayaṃ lohamayaṃ saṅkhanābhimayaṃ suttamayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.13: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gaṇṭhikampi pāsakampi cīvare appenti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.21: pāsakaphalakaṃ sattaṅgulaṃ vā aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ vā ogāhetvā appetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihinivatthaṃ nivāsenti—
pli-tv-kd15:29.4.9: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihipārutaṃ pārupanti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsenti.
pli-tv-kd15:30.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ubhatokājaṃ haranti.
pli-tv-kd15:30.1.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekatokājaṃ antarākājaṃ sīsabhāraṃ khandhabhāraṃ kaṭibhāraṃ olambakan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dantakaṭṭhaṃ na khādanti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.5: Acakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti—
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.6: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.8: Cakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ na duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti—
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.9: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane.
pli-tv-kd15:31.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghāni dantakaṭṭhāni khādanti, teheva sāmaṇeraṃ ākoṭenti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.2.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ, na ca tena sāmaṇero ākoṭetabbo.
pli-tv-kd15:31.2.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno atimaṭāhakaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādantassa kaṇṭhe vilaggaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dāyaṃ ālimpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.7: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā tiṇagahanā honti, davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne vihārā ḍayhanti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.8: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyanti paṭaggiṃ dātuṃ, parittaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.10: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne paṭaggiṃ dātuṃ, parittaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū rukkhaṃ abhiruhanti, rukkhā rukkhaṃ saṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantassa antarāmagge hatthī pariyuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.8: Atha kho so bhikkhu rukkhamūlaṃ upadhāvitvā kukkuccāyanto rukkhaṃ na abhiruhi.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.10: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.12: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sati karaṇīye porisaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ āpadāsu yāvadatthan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena yameḷakekuṭā nāma bhikkhū dve bhātikā honti brāhmaṇajātikā kalyāṇavācā kalyāṇavākkaraṇā.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.2: Te yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.4: “etarahi, bhante, bhikkhū nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.6: Handa mayaṃ, bhante, buddhavacanaṃ chandaso āropemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.8: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, evaṃ vakkhatha—
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.15: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sakāya niruttiyā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū lokāyataṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.4: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.6: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, lokāyate sāradassāvī imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.8: “Imasmiṃ vā pana dhammavinaye sāradassāvī lokāyataṃ pariyāpuṇeyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.12: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū lokāyataṃ vācenti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.18: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.24: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṃ vācenti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento khipi.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.8: “api nu kho, bhikkhave, khipite ‘jīvā’ti vutto tappaccayā jīveyya vā mareyya vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.12: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhūnaṃ khipite “jīvatha, bhante”ti vadanti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.15: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ‘jīvatha, bhante’ti vuccamānā nālapissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.18: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ ‘jīvatha, bhante’ti vuccamānena ‘ciraṃ jīvā’ti vattun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.6: Addasā kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.8: “kiṃ nu kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekamantaṃ nisinno”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.13: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, taṃ khāditabbaṃ, yaṃ khāditvā evarūpāya dhammakathāya paribāhiyo assā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:34.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa udaravātābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.2.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:34.2.3: “pubbe te, āvuso sāriputta, udaravātābādho kena phāsu hotī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:35.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṃ tahaṃ passāvaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṃ tahaṃ vaccaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.2.21: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santharitvā majjhe chiddaṃ katvā vaccaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.9: Ajjhokāse vaccaṃ karontā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.12: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.15: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.16: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu jarādubbalo vaccaṃ katvā vuṭṭhahanto paripatati.
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.7: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.20: Ācamanapādukā pākaṭā honti, bhikkhū hiriyanti ācametuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.23: Ācamanakumbhī apārutā hoti, tiṇacuṇṇehipi paṃsukehipi okiriyyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ ācaranti—
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.2: mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, āveḷaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, uracchadaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.3: Te kulitthīnaṃ kuladhītānaṃ kulakumārīnaṃ kulasuṇhānaṃ kuladāsīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, āveḷaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, uracchadaṃ harantipi harāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.4: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṃ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.5: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.6: lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.7: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.8: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.10: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti, rathassapi purato dhāvantipi ādhāvantipi;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.12: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṃ pattharitvā naccakiṃ evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmante uruvelakassape pabbajite saṃghassa bahuṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.3: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā lohabhaṇḍaṃ anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññātaṃ;
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā paharaṇiṃ sabbaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ, ṭhapetvā āsandiṃ pallaṅkaṃ dārupattaṃ dārupādukaṃ sabbaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ, ṭhapetvā katakañca kumbhakārikañca sabbaṃ mattikābhaṇḍan”ti.
